name: Tiger Envelopes - mail encryption

screenshots.caption: One click to install and configure your mail client
Verify each key before you trust your mail is private

short_description: With Tiger Envelopes you can stop snoops from reading your email. Same email client. No extra steps. One click to install on Windows and Linux. Configures Outlook, Thunderbird, and KMail. Supports GPG, PGP, Bouncy Castle encryption.
